metadata.name: The Quest for Character: #1
metadata.description: "The Quest for Character" generative art project combines generative art and custom animation. Each piece in the collection is created using the unique wallet address of the collector as a starting point, resulting in a one-of-a-kind artwork that is truly personalized to them. Each piece is exported at 4K (3840x2160), so the art work can be displayed on hi def screens with zero quality loss.
